description: Check to see that all hosts in a scale-out environment have a consistent OS version and Kernel version.

queries.name: q_oskernel_check
queries.sql: SELECT DISTINCT(VALUE) as value FROM M_HOST_INFORMATION WHERE KEY='os_kernel_version'

queries.name: q_osversion_check
queries.sql: SELECT DISTINCT(VALUE) AS value FROM M_HOST_INFORMATION WHERE KEY='os_cpe_name'

actions.description: Operating System version or Linux kernel versions are not consistent across all nodes in the SAP HANA scale-out landscape. Address the version mismatches to ensure optimal performance, stability and supportability.

references: SAP HANA Database Checklists and Recommendations,2235581 - SAP HANA: Supported Operating Systems,https://me.sap.com/notes/2235581
